frontend-assets.title: Frontend assets
frontend-assets.description: A list of all Frontend asset definitions that are supported by the associated project.

services.title: Service configurations
services.description: A list of additional service configurations, can be relative to the current working directory.

asset-definition.title: Frontend asset definition
asset-definition.description: A Frontend asset definition with mandatory source and target and optional configuration for VCS and available environments.

source.title: Frontend asset source
source.description: Definition of the Frontend asset source of a concrete Frontend asset definition.

type.title: Asset source type
type.description: Type of a concrete Frontend asset source (an appropriate Provider must exist).

url.title: Asset source URL
url.description: An URL representing the remote asset source for a concrete Frontend asset.

version.title: Asset source version
version.description: Locked version of the asset source for a concrete Frontend asset.

revision-url.title: Asset source revision URL
revision-url.description: An URL representing the revision of a remote asset source for a concrete Frontend asset.

command.title: Asset source generation command
command.description: An optional command to generate a local asset source for a concrete Frontend asset (`{root}` will be replaced by the project root directory).

target.title: Frontend asset target
target.description: Definition of the Frontend asset target of a concrete Frontend asset definition.

type.title: Asset target type
type.description: Type of a concrete Frontend asset target (an appropriate Processor must exist).

path.title: Asset target path
path.description: The target path where to extract provided Frontend assets.

revision-file.title: Asset target revision file
revision-file.description: The filename of the local revision file representing this Frontend asset target.

vcs.title: Frontend asset VCS configuration
vcs.description: An optional configuration about the VCS of a concrete Frontend asset definition.

type.title: Asset VCS type
type.description: Type of a concrete Frontend asset VCS provider (an appropriate Provider must exist).

environments.title: Frontend asset environments
environments.description: An optional configuration about supported environments of a concrete Frontend asset definition.

merge.title: Merge asset environments
merge.description: Defines whether to merge the given environments map with the default map provided by the MapFactory.

map.title: Asset environment map
map.description: Mapping table between branches an their appropriate Frontend asset environments.

transformer.title: Environment transformer name
transformer.description: The name of the environment transformer to be used for transforming the branch name to an appropriate asset environment.

options.title: Transformer options
options.description: Additional options passed to the environment transformer.

handler.title: Frontend asset handler type
handler.description: Type of a concrete Frontend asset handler (an appropriate Handler must exist).
